ModMetaData.name: WorkRebalancer
ModMetaData.author: PirateBY
ModMetaData.description:
Mod for rebalance all recipes / works amount and etc... at runtime. Check mod settings.
This mod for debug purposes, speedrun or tweak some categories in regular game.
Tweakable categories: -Researches -Recipes -Construction speed -Works speed -Growth speed of plants -Another
Issues: https://github.com/bananasss00/RW-WorkRebalancer/issues
